title: Do you find this text abusive?
body:
Hell everyone

I just received a 14 day ban on my account for abusive comments in chat and here is my text riot gave me. in my opinion this text is not abusive at all even with riots kinder-garden standards on toxicity which makes me wonder does riot just ban people depending on how many reports they got using bots and has no human monitoring them since they are too cheap? here is the text, do you really find this abusive enough do be bannable? if yes then I'm done with this community of autistic kids who have been bullied in school for their whole life.
Game 1
zSilent: bot ez gank
zSilent: malph sup why we  could have had proper sup this woulndt hapen
zSilent: report malphite please troll sup pick, not ur fault this guy wants us to lose
zSilent: open mid malph is hopless
zSilent: yea this is it im running it down, need to show trolls like this malph what they deserve soz boys this is lost
zSilent: lol when silver scrub with 400 games 50% win rate tells a plat smurf dont play ranked, God Carry Lord main acc this acc 60% win
zSilent: a troll support gets what a troll support deserves
zSilent: hopefully this malphite now learns not pick troll supports after game, i have now stopped a lot of adc players from getting cancer
zSilent: no guys dont ff we got this, malphite hoping u have learnt ur lesson, next adc will probs do the same to u if u pick malph support

replies.body:
> zSilent: yea this is it im running it down, need to show trolls like this malph what they deserve soz boys this is lost

were you intent feeding? Oh snap! [You probably were! ](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=zSilent) Intent feeders get a 2 week ban on their first offence (looks like you have two in your recent match history)

you [intent fed ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q3)(hence the automatic 14 day ban instead of a chat restriction)
The fact you admitted to intent feeding in your chat log backs this up
You picked on a malphite support, for what? Playing off meta? Jeez.
Maybe if you kept your mouth shut, none of this would've happened.

"Autistic kids ..." 

No one cares that you're a Plat that can't carry. You're the kid getting upset and 'blaming' others. 

People get banned for intentional feeding. You intentionally fed. I see the malphite is still regularly playing games, meanwhile you are banned. Haha I guess you're the one learning a lesson. 

#rekt - PS I hope Riot ban your plat account too with this information.
See ya later. No ones gonna miss you.

perfectly fine tbh. chat wasnt even that bad, people need to toughen up

but if you did int then that explains the ban

Well deserved

Also how is malphite support a troll pick.
now post the other 2 game chat log LOL!
